title: Amazing Lease with Right to Purchase Opportunity
posting_body: End it, or resign for up to five years.
*Pictures are a few of the real homes I've helped get tenants in*
Call, email, or text me DETAILS on what you're looking for i.e beds, area, max monthly rental budget, house criteria etc.
Contact me to learn more about an innovative Rental with Option to Purchase program.
Unlike rent to own programs or other lease options, there is no obligation to buy and no non-refundable option fees.
• No history of eviction or other landlord issues
